author: Jonathan Cox
comment: I continue to be amazed. This is my fifth watch face. They are all great and I will probably end up buying all of them. Sci-Fi, functionality and great design. Keep up the good work! -Note- the battery gauge for the phone on this one doesn't seem to update or stay accurate. I have also had this happen in the station watch face. Thanks!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jonathan, ill look into it,thanks for the feedback.. ill follow up.

title: Superb

author: Brad Harvey
comment: This watch face is awesome and highly customizable but I did notice some lag while using this face. I do love the options that come with it and recommend it to anyone. If there was a way to make it a little lighter as far as functionality I would re-write this and give it 5 stars 10 times over.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Brad, i will look into this since im constantly updating these watch face its just a matter of time... Thanks for the comments! :)

title: Awesome watch face but...

author: Samuel M HOFFMANN
comment: Liking this watch face on my moto 360 2015 (marshmallow).  Is it possible to have the option of battery status on ambient mode ?  I'm thinking the text version rather than dial.  Easily 5 star from me after that.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Samuel, if you wanna email me about it that be awesome for follow up :) Thanks for the feedback.

title: This watch face is great.

author: Kim Bennett
comment: Many ways to customize this face. No apparent battery drain. So far I am loving it

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Kim... Thanks a lot for the support, i keep working at it to perfect it... stick around :)

title: Great options

author: Irving BigDady Eskenazi
comment: What can I say about this guy, well he makes art that speaks to me, I just recently discovered the PHLASH and this man is a true artist and make some of the most beautiful watchfaces out there and that's WORD.) I'm sure that the angels in heaven weep with every new release, so thanks for that man, my wrist has never looked better.)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Irving, you're obviously a man of taste :)

title: My favorite Artist

author: Felix Ng
comment: The Design is nice, the 1st watch face I bought. However I wish you can turn that digital clock into second time zone! That would be awesome!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Felix, that's a great idea... maybe i could also have a secondary digital clock at the bottom as to show two time zones at once...  Good stuff... its noted... Thanks for the support, its appreciated!

author: Jesse The Couch Movie Critic
comment: Once again Tha Phlash delivers a zing time piece. Clean lines and actually looks like metal. Keep up the good work homie.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jesse, thanks for the support sir... much appreciated :)

title: Once again you do it again Phlash

author: Piotr Karnas
comment: This dude makes the best looking watch faces around!  Purchased three from this dev already.  You won't be disappointed!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Piotr, thanks for the great vibes (you will love the next one coming out in a few weeks. Gorgeous!)

title: Fantastic!

author: Jason Platt
comment: Just a few suggestions: I too vote for some color presets, and something needs to fill the bottom half of the screen.  Maybe a bigger weather display, or put the weather where the battery is currently and use the bottom for dual phone/watch battery meters.  Also it would be greatly appreciated if I could choose a different time zone for the digital clock.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jason.. these are great suggestions, and ill look at each of them meticulously. Thanks for speaking out and giving me precious feedbacks, much appreciated.

title: More good stuff from a solid watch dev.

author: Kyle Johnson
comment: Awesome watch face.  Any chance to included some preset designs like your pictures show?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Kyle... Yup its in the works, and should come around as presets to ease the task of switching pretty soon. Still working on it. Thanks for the feedback!

title: Awesome

author: R Wiley
comment: Remarkable, just freaking Remarkable.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up R Wiley, Thanks bro!

title: Love it...

author: Joshua Rossi
comment: Awesome as always

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Joshua, thanks infinitely as usual.

author: Ted Jenkins
comment: Faces are a dime a dozen out there. The differentiator has instead become what developer will be responsive when issues arise. This dude is always responsive with questions and problems. Plus, his faces simply rock. Boom!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ted, Thanks for the kinds words it always helps towards the developer's sanity :)

title: Developer is Tha BEST

author: Alex Boeru
comment: Hello, much respect for your work. It is possible please to add some presets like in the photos? Thank you !

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Alex, sure... i been wanting to make changing color super simple, so im with you. Thanks for the feedbacks!

title: Good

author: Luis Cortes
comment: This is my go to watch face for now. Only thing is I'd like to have is the option to get rid of the zero number on single digit hours because it overlaps on the weather graphic next to it. LG G watch square.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Luis, im on it! Thanks for taking the time to let me know and send me screenshots... very cool.

title: I love it.

author: Benjamin Magalhaes
comment: Looks amazing. and love being able to customize on the watch itself instead of needing to get my phone. simple and beautifull watch face. Great job

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ben, thanks for the appreciation, stay tuned as the next update will improve battery life :)

author: Ed Presutti
comment: Beautiful design, lots of functionality. Looks amazing on my Moto 360.  Another smash hit from Tha Phlash!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ed, thanks for the great comment and awesome support!

author: Gerard Dunning
comment: Thanks! Awesome face.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Gerard, thx for sticking around in my quest for perfection :)

title: Latest update works well

author: Anthony Hopkins
comment: yet another awesome watch face from the PHLASH.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up ANTH0NYS, thanks for the good vibes, its great in the mornings :)

author: Michael Rák
comment: I don't know how you do it, but you always top anything else on the Play Store and this is no different! This watch face actually looks realistic, advanced, and actually feels how a smartwatch face should! I've been constantly changing faces trying to find one that belongs on a smartwatch, yours were always the closest, but this one at long last is that perfect watch face! Absolutely REMARKABLE!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Michael, thanks you for the positive feels, i admit im rocking this watchface on all day myself as well :)

title: REMARKABLE Watch!!!

author: Dave Berenson
comment: The color picker on the watch is better  than the wear app. I kind of like the space at the bottom so the transparent now cards doesn't  block the design on my LG G Watch.   Hurray! Dev was (as always) responsive to reasonable requests. 5 stars and is now truly remarkable 😀

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Dave.... Dude, its my fault, i launched without the 24hrs totally finished... but ill rectify that very shortly. Thanks a lot for the feedback's!

title: Awesome look and great wear interface

author: Russell Nichols
comment: Great options, colors! Awesome look!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Russell, i really appreciate that man. Thanks for supporting my work sir.

title: Outstanding as usual! Dare I say "Remarkable"?!

author: Niko Alfonso
comment: awesome!!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Raymond , i really appreciate you take the time to support! Thanks!

author: Brian Roberts
comment: Best watch faces on Google Play

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Brian, thank you sir. Means a lot.

title: Digital perfection

author: Chris Riddell
comment: Really cool watch face. I too would love to see a 24 hour option in the digital clock. Also, remove the digital seconds when in ambient mode. Apart from those 2 niggles, great face. The blank piece at the bottom for notifications is really well thought out.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris... yeah i have that 24hrs coming shortly, i just needed to test a little something first.. but gimme a few days. Thanks for the feedback.. it's on!

author: Patrick Boland
comment: I really like this watch face, I just have one question. Is there any way to change the temperature to celsius? I don't see any option to change that.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Patrick... Simply go in the watch face settings from the android wear app on your phone. In the general settings of the watch face you will find the Celsius toggle. Thanks for the feedback's

author: Adam Howes-Wray
comment: Lush face, sits above notifications nicely without hiding any of the info. Nice colour options too.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Adam, thanks for noticing the design effort and giving me feedback's i appreciate it!

title: 10/10 would bang

author: Bruce Bivins
comment: You gotta rock Phlash Tha lastest on Android Wear, me i do it with moto 360,and it is Remarkable!!!!!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Bruce, you sir are a class act!

title: Totally Tha

author: Thomas Peters
comment: Absolutely love it. Never Forget Vegas Man!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Thomas... Never forget, never surrender :)

title: Yo,

author: Lance Stratton
comment: Perfectly named watch face. Tons of customization. Gotta love ThaPhlashs amazing design skills. True art

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: i wanted to call it LANCE... but the council decided for REMARKABLE, i stand by my first suggestion tho.

title: Remarkable!
